document.title: [PSN] Mise a jour hebdo du 14/09/2011
document.author: JohnCouscous
document.text:
Hello, voici la mise à jour de la semaine (14/09/2011) sur le PlayStation Network :
PlayStation Store (via PS3, PSP et Media Go) Contenu PlayStation Plus Renegade Ops – 20% de reduction avec l’offre PLAY (jusqu’au 21 septembre) From Dust – 20% de réduction (une semaine seulement) Alpha Mission (SNK minis) – 20% de réduction Essai et déblocage (PS3) Renegade Ops (12.99 €) Ce produit est gratuit pour ceux qui les précommandes de l’offre PLAY – Rating: PEGI 12 (USK 16) From Dust (14.99 €) Rating: PEGI 12 Jeux complets (PS3) Bulletstorm (29.99 €) Rating: PEGI 18 Bodycount (49.99 €) Rating: PEGI 16 Fast Draw Showdown (9.99 €) Rating: PEGI 16 Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell Trilogy HD (39.99 €) Rating: PEGI 18 God of War Collection: Volume II (29.99 €) Rating: PEGI 18 God of War HD Collection: Volume II (29.99 €) Rating: PEGI 18 God of War: Chains of Olympus HD (17.99 €) Rating: PEGI 18 God of War: Ghost of Sparta HD (17.99 €) Rating: PEGI 18 minis (PS3 et PSP) Arcade Essentials Evolution (4.99 €) Rating: PEGI 3 Revoltin’ Youth (1.99 €) (nouvelle publication) Rating: PEGI 3 Alpha Mission (2.49 €) Rating: PEGI 7 Ikari Warriors (2.49 €) Rating: PEGI 16 Démos (PS3) Ace Combat: Assault Horizon Rating: PEGI 16 FIFA 12 Rating: PEGI 3 PES 2012 – Pro Evolution Soccer Rating: PEGI 3 Add-On Game Content (PS3) Dynasty Warriors: Gundam 3 – Extra Set of Mobile Suits 5 (3.99 €) Rating: PEGI 12 Dynasty Warriors 7 Rating: PEGI 16 Original Costume Pack 4 (4.99 €) Stage 3 Pack (3.99 €) Weapon Rank Pack 2 (1.99 €) Champion Jockey: G1 Jockey & Gallop Racer – Medieval Pack (2.49 €) Rating: PEGI 3 Yoostar 2 Rating: PEGI 12 – Disponibilité: non disponible en Belgique American Wolf Man in London (1.75 €) Desert Fire (1.75 €) Friend: Good! (1.75 €) True Family (1.75 €) Ride the Griffin! (1.75 €) Section 8: Prejudice – Frontier Colonies Map Pack (4.99 €) Rating: PEGI 16 Magic: The Gathering – Duels of the Planeswalkers 2012 – Magic 2012 Expansion (3.99 €) Rating: PEGI 7 Avatars EyePet Piggy Pet (0.25 €) Wizard Pet (0.25 €) Knight Pet (0.25 €) Fast Draw Showdown Angry Cowboy (0.25 €) Classic Cowboy (0.25 €) Cowboy with Horse (0.25 €) Crazy Cowboy (0.25 €) Logo (0.25 €) Wes Flowers – A (0.25 €) Wes Flowers – B (0.25 €) Renegade Ops – Bryant Avatar (0.25 €) Thèmes (PS3) TV/Films Warner Bro’s ‘Horrible Bosses’ Theme (Espagne) Thèmes dynamiques(PS3) Abstrait Dynamic Squares Theme (1.99 €) P90 Theme (1.99 €) Jeux Fast Draw Showdown Dynamic Theme (0.99 €) Nature Great Beach Theme (1.99 €) Great Dawn Theme (1.99 €) Lightning In Night Sky Theme (1.99 €) Vidéos (PS3) God of War: Game Directors Live Renegade Ops Launch Trailer Wrecked: Revenge Revisited Weapons PEGI Trailer Assassin’s Creed: Revelations Announcement Trailer Armageddon Riders Gameplay Video The Baconing Character Trailer Cinematic Trailer Launch Trailer
Cette semaine, les démos de FIFA 12 (la 1ère) et PES 2012 (la 2ème), idéal pour savoir quel jeu de foot vous pourrez choisir, même si je pense avoir fait me choix, je vais prendre le temps de bien essayer les 2 ce week-end !
